info.name: CavalcadePrintable
info.description: Print product descriptions from Cavalcade Vine (DK wine shop) more compactly, eliminating the least useful information and whitespace, but still keeping the primary product image(s).
info.additionalInfo:
* 20160110 r1.1.0: Avoid image collision when the introductory description is missing or very short

* 20160109 r1.0.0: Style created, first public release
